column4: I have a USB external Hard drive. Is it possible to somehow have it running as well as my current hard drive running, and switch over to it like a VNC between computers... ?
either  you're confused, or I am (-:

I want to be able to swap over to my other hard drive that runs a separate operating system. Right now I have to restart, switch the hard drive boot sequence in the bios and login. I want to be able to login to ubuntu on the USB drive while running my current internal hard drive
